sentences.en: a house set in idyllic surroundings
sentences.cn: 在田园风光的环境中的房子

sentences.en: He didn't feel completely at ease in the strange surroundings.
sentences.cn: 他在陌生的环境中感到不那么自在.

sentences.en: He was an expert at finding his way, even in strange surroundings.
sentences.cn: 他是认路的行家，即使在陌生的环境中也是如此。

sentences.en: Her son Peter adapted effortlessly to his new surroundings.
sentences.cn: 她儿子彼得很快就适应了新环境。

sentences.en: I need to work in pleasant surroundings.
sentences.cn: 我需要在舒适的环境下工作。

sentences.en: It must have reinforced my determination to blend into my surroundings.
sentences.cn: 这势必让我更加下定决心融入周围环境。

sentences.en: Schumacher adapted effortlessly to his new surroundings.
sentences.cn: 舒马赫非常轻松地适应了新环境。

sentences.en: She felt uneasy in the unfamiliar surroundings.
sentences.cn: 她在陌生的环境中感到局促不安。

sentences.en: She is not very well tuned into her surroundings.
sentences.cn: 她不太适应周围的环境.

sentences.en: She's contemptuous of my humble home and poor surroundings.
sentences.cn: 她瞧不起我出身卑贱,家境贫困.

sentences.en: The chameleon changes colour to match its surroundings.
sentences.cn: 变色龙变换颜色以适应环境.

sentences.en: The new building does not harmonize with its surroundings.
sentences.cn: 那栋新楼与周围环境不协调。

sentences.en: The paint of the house jars with the beautiful surroundings.
sentences.cn: 这所房子的颜色与它那美丽的周围环境很不协调.

sentences.en: We are averse to such noisy surroundings.
sentences.cn: 我们不喜欢这么吵闹的环境.
我们在富丽堂皇的环境中用餐。

trans.tran_cn: （周围的）环境[事物]，环境，周围的事物( surrounding的名词复数)，一带
trans.tran_en: the objects, buildings, natural things etc that are around a person or thing at a particular time
